instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924-a restart with in 10 to 15 second
threads.message:
All voltages present, including CPU
u1950   pin 3   - 3.3   pin 7 - 3.3

threads.title: 820-4924-a restart with in 10 to 15 second
threads.message:
Do you get USB activity?
Machine chimes?

threads.title: 820-4924-a restart with in 10 to 15 second
threads.message: If it is restarting meaning bootlooping where the Apple comes up and then it shuts off and repeats, try a known good battery

threads.title: 820-4924-a restart with in 10 to 15 second
threads.message:
USB no activity
bios change but no improvement

threads.title: 820-4924-a restart with in 10 to 15 second
threads.message: Ok makes more sense no USB activity. Inspect closely corrosion around the SMC, U1950, and U1900?
